name: Astronaut Escape Demo
description:
This is a demo that is the result of a course project from MSU.  I am currently developing it as a full game of about 150 levels. Final game will have a wildly different visual style, but the gameplay will not change.

Currently the planned release date is 2023.

The demo is also available in Google Play Store.

If you would like to help me make this game, you can donate any amount when downloading the game. Thanks in advance.

Have fun!
